activity.instructions: Click on the cards. Match each definition you see with the word or phrase you hear.

correctFlipDelay.oae-label: Delay time (milliseconds) before a correct match is cleared

incorrectFlipDelay.oae-label: Delay time (milliseconds) before an incorrect match is flipped over
